synonyms: tāra madhye—within that period; chaya vatsara—for six years; gamana-āgamana—going and coming; nīlācala—from Jagannātha Purī; gauḍa—to Bengal; setubandha—and from Cape Comorin; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana-dhāma.
translation: For six years of the last twenty-four, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu traveled all over India from Jagannātha Purī to Bengal and from Cape Comorin to Vṛndāvana.
